meanings.definition: To restore color to (something) by repigmenting.
meanings.sent1: She is repigmenting the old painting to make it colorful again.
meanings.sent2: The artist is repigmenting the faded mural on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The sun seems to be repigmenting the sky with its warm rays.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter repigmented the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The flowers repigmenting the garden after the long winter were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The process of regaining color by repigmenting.
meanings.sent1: The repigmenting of the leaves in autumn is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The repigmenting of the hair after the treatment was successful.
meanings.sent3: The repigmenting of the rainbow after the storm brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The repigmenting of the city with street art transformed its look.
meanings.sent5: The repigmenting of the butterfly's wings was a fascinating process to observe.
